Title: Yes, Your Tide Is Cold and Dark, Sir
Actors: Christopher Malinowski, Aimee Cassada, Chrissy Tackett, Evangeline Young
Plot: In September of 2009, 63-year-old RUDY "CLAY" CLAITONOWSKY, a rogue guitar instructor, and three of his teen-aged pupils disappeared without a trace into the sand dunes of Cape Henlopen, ...
